item.title: Polybar Build Guide
item.description: This article provides a step-by-step guide on how to assemble the Polybar, a 3D printed Guitar Hero controller. It covers everything from preparing the printed parts to wiring and flashing firmware.

item.title: How To Fix an Unrecognised Blue Yeti
item.description: Has your Blue Yeti suddenly gone unrecognised in Windows? Fear not. This common problem is easily solved after re-flashing the EEPROM. This guide will help you do just that.
